title: I Showed Up, Where’s My Medal?
description:
Are team sports teaching kids anything about patience, tolerance, resilience, or teamwork if they don’t even keep score? Plus, Jillian takes a look at the best ways to gauge body fat, and answers email questions on activated charcoal drinks, amino acids and much more!


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ
